price: [Isaan] ni jedhaniin: “Sila dhugaan nutti dhufte moo ati warra taphatan irraayi?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
